reviewText: Many years ago when tapes like these first hit the market in the 80's they 'seemed' like a good idea, but with subliminals the person making them must absolutely BE very truthful & trustworthy, otherwise someone listening to these kinds of tapes may be programed with information that may be 'hurtful'. Then too, one never knows how they will really affect another individual? Maybe they work & maybe they don't? My first useage didn't seem to do anything, but in all fairness IF I listened & watched this tape more than once perhaps it would(?).
